EmailTemplate.description: this template is used to send to end user when his approval got rejected
EmailTemplate.name: IAM Application Rejection Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account â€“ Request Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your registration request for {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Application_Name__c} has been denied. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact your Distributor Administrator, Cummins account representative or care.cummins.com.
Sincerely, Cummins Support This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
